attributes.action: introduce strong penalties to deter the vandalism of war memorials.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Vandalism of memorials to our war dead is on the increase. Whether to steal the metal, or simply for the "thrill", these actions distress old a young alike for their disrespect for those who gave their lives in the defense of our freedoms.
We demand mandatory prison terms for all offenders, as well as financial restitution for the repair of the memorial.
